name: jOmglook
body:
### jOmglook Simple jquery plugin to show basic social media buttons with a a small javascript snippet. I found a lot of solutions for this for wordpress, but none were quite quick enough for me. ### How to use Simply include the script from wherever your js is hosted. ``` ``` Then attach jOmglook to a containing div. You can style the containing div however you want! ```
``` ### Support or Contact Bugs or issues please use github to track! You can also email me: rick@rickchendesign.com
tagline: jQuery plugin to show social media buttons - OMG look.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
